question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [Take off, rise, and go left over the flat roof. Fly straight to the building with a lady on a billboard, then veer right and continue straight. Head to the yellow billboard, make a half right turn, and fly over the fountain towards the trees. Fly over the treetops, veer right towards the road between buildings, then take a near full left turn over trees until you see water. Rise near a tree, turn right until you see four buildings, then go straight to the car banner. Fly between the banner and building, continue straight, veer left of the high-rise, then a bit right. Descend to see a 5-story building, turn left, rise above it, and make a half left turn. Fly right of the car banner building to see the skyline, then turn left slightly and fly high over the trees.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I am flying over the treetops.  
B. I walk straight and get up when I see the tree.  
C. I fly over buildings.  
D. I turn right at the building.  
E. I turn to the left of the tall building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The sequence of images shows the agent flying over buildings, which aligns with the navigation instruction to "fly straight to the building with a lady on a billboard" and subsequent maneuvers around buildings. This indicates that the agent is currently flying over buildings as part of the given instructions.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 32)]
Option: [C]
Reason: From the beginning of the video to 32 seconds, the agent is flying over buildings. This aligns with the navigation instruction to "fly straight to the building with a lady on a billboard".
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The sequence of images shows the agent flying over buildings, which aligns with the navigation instruction to "fly straight to the building with a lady on a billboard" and subsequent maneuvers around buildings. This indicates that the agent is currently flying over buildings as part of the given instructions.
